title: Slider

<PackageInfo packageSlug="slider" />
This package makes it incredibly easy to create sliders of every kind â€” free-scrolling, drag-scrolling, snapping, auto-playing, and so much more. Sliders are fully responsive and can even synchronize with other sliders. They are very easy to control using the built-in navigation components or provided methods.
Some common uses for this package include:
- Image sliders
- Content sliders
- Fullscreen sliders
- Lightbox sliders
- Thumbnail sliders
